column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/375420Oust Najib to block Hadi's bill, BN component parties told12 March 2017Should the 45 non-Umno BN MPs withdraw their support withdraw their support from Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak, the latter's government would collapse immediately, said DAP parliamentary leader Lim Kit Siang.He said the 45 non-Umno BN MPs should do so in view of their opposition towards PAS president Abdul Hadi Awang's attempt to amend the Syariah Courts (Criminal Jurisdiction) Act 1965 (Act 355), which is supported by Umno.BN component parties should realise by now that Umno's fervour in facilitating Abdul Hadi's private members bill should be seen as an attempt to subvert BN's consensus model, said Lim.For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
Hmm there are 132 Muslim mps?  (deduct 2 from dap)  so still majority in parliament?

All BN MP is already in najib pocket. He is a politician, so lets look at the political side of this issue. Najib currently needs all the support he can get. MCA and MIC didnt contribute much in the last GE. Its obvious najib has lost support from non malays. So what should he do? Get support from PAS followers la. Y should he listen to MIC n MCA when PAS is the 1 that can help him?
As far as i last know, only umno & pas mp support the bill.
najib will do what he'd been doing best, 'politiking'......najib will ask anyone from bn mp who doesnt agree to abstain from voting
no confidence towards pm doesn't that meant the agong need to di solve the parliment hence GE?
seem here this act 355 make bn in trouble too.
bijan probably already feed his lackeys the highest grade dedaknot easy to oust bijan
Must muslim support hudud? That means ulama Hadi should be PM at no doubt... lol...
